sqlMap.select: select a.order_no, a.order_name, a.order_cust, a.order_begin_date, a.order_end_date, a.is_full, b.customer_name from t_order_info a left join t_customer_info b on a.order_cust = b.customer_id order by a.order_end_date
select a.order_no, a.product_id, a.product_name, a.product_num, a.product_cnt, a.product_price, a.is_full from t_order_product_info a where a.order_no = #order_no#

select a.material_id, a.material_name, a.material_num, a.is_material, b.company_id, b.company_name from ( select material_id, material_name, material_num, '1' as is_material from t_material_info union ALL select accessory_id as material_id, accessory_name as material_name, accessory_num as material_num, '0' as is_material from t_accessory_info where is_buy = '1' ) a left join t_company_material_info b on b.material_id = a.material_id

select a.material_id, a.material_name, a.material_num, a.is_material, b.company_id, b.company_name from ( select material_id, material_name, material_num, '1' as is_material from t_material_info union ALL select tai.accessory_id as material_id, tai.accessory_name as material_name, tai.accessory_num as material_num, '0' as is_material from t_order_product_info topi LEFT JOIN t_product_accessory_info tpai on topi.product_id = tpai.product_id left join t_accessory_info tai on tai.accessory_id = tpai.accessory_id and tai.is_buy = '1' where topi.order_no = #orderId# and tai.accessory_id is not null ) a left join t_company_material_info b on b.material_id = a.material_id
select a.product_line_id, a.product_line_name, a.product_line_status from t_product_line_info a
select a.product_line_id, a.product_line_name, a.product_line_status from t_product_line_info a where a.product_line_status = #available_type#
select a.machine_id, a.machine_name, a.belong_product_line, a.is_available from t_machine_info a
select a.machine_id, a.machine_name, a.belong_product_line, a.is_available from t_machine_info a
select a.machine_id, a.machine_name, a.function_id, a.function_name, a.is_available, a.elapsed_time, a.machine_cost, a.human_cost from t_machine_function_info a

select tmfi.* from t_order_product_info topi LEFT JOIN t_product_accessory_info tpai on topi.product_id = tpai.product_id LEFT JOIN t_machine_function_info tmfi on tmfi.accessory_id = tpai.accessory_id where topi.order_no = #orderId# and tmfi.function_id is not null
select tmfi.* from t_product_accessory_info tpai LEFT JOIN t_machine_function_info tmfi on tmfi.accessory_id = tpai.accessory_id where tpai.product_id = #productId# and tmfi.function_id is not null
select tmfi.* from t_product_accessory_info tpai LEFT JOIN t_machine_function_info tmfi on tmfi.accessory_id = tpai.accessory_id where tpai.product_id = #productId# and tmfi.function_id is not null
select a.accessory_id , a.accessory_name , a.accessory_num, a.is_buy from t_accessory_info where a.is_buy = '0'

select tai.accessory_id , tai.accessory_name , tai.accessory_num, tai.is_buy from t_order_product_info topi LEFT JOIN t_product_accessory_info tpai on topi.product_id = tpai.product_id left join t_accessory_info tai on tai.accessory_id = tpai.accessory_id and tai.is_buy = '0' where topi.order_no = #orderId# and tai.accessory_id is not null

select topi.order_no, topi.product_cnt, topi.product_num, topi.product_id, topi.product_name, topi.product_price, (topi.product_price * topi.product_num ) as total_amount, toi.order_end_date, (tpi.product_cost * topi.product_num ) as total_cost, toi.factor1, toi.factor2, tci.customer_important from t_order_product_info topi left join t_product_info tpi on tpi.product_id = topi.product_id left JOIN t_order_info toi on topi.order_no = toi.order_no left join t_customer_info tci on toi.order_cust = tci.customer_id where topi.order_no = #orderId# and topi.is_full = '0'

select topi.order_no, topi.product_cnt, topi.product_num, topi.product_id, topi.product_name, topi.product_price, (topi.product_price * topi.product_num ) as total_amount, toi.order_end_date, (tpi.product_cost * topi.product_num ) as total_cost, toi.factor1, toi.factor2, tci.customer_important , ((topi.product_price * topi.product_num -tpi.product_cost * topi.product_num ) * (toi.factor1 + toi.factor2 + tci.customer_important) ) as prd_pa from t_order_product_info topi left join t_product_info tpi on tpi.product_id = topi.product_id left JOIN t_order_info toi on topi.order_no = toi.order_no left join t_customer_info tci on toi.order_cust = tci.customer_id where topi.order_no = #orderId#
select tpi.* from t_product_info tpi LEFT JOIN t_order_product_info topi on topi.product_id = tpi.product_id and topi.order_no = #nowOnlineOrderId# where topi.order_no is null

select tai.accessory_id, tai.accessory_name, (CASE when topi.id is null then 0 else 1 end) as is_prd from t_accessory_info tai LEFT JOIN t_product_accessory_info tpai on tpai.accessory_id = tai.accessory_id left join t_order_product_info topi on topi.product_id = tpai.product_id and topi.order_no = #nowOnlineOrderId# where tai.is_buy = 0 order by tai.accessory_name

select tt.accessory_name, tt.accessory_id, case when temp.tatal_num is NULL then 0 else temp.tatal_num end as tatal_num, case when temp.tatal_num is NULL then tt.accessory_num else (tt.accessory_num - temp.tatal_num ) end as buy_num, tcmi.company_id, tcmi.company_name from t_accessory_info tt LEFT JOIN ( select sum(topi.product_num) as tatal_num, tai.accessory_name, tai.accessory_id from t_order_product_info topi left JOIN t_product_accessory_info tpai on tpai.product_id = topi.product_id left join t_accessory_info tai on tai.accessory_id = tpai.accessory_id where topi.order_no = #nowOnlineOrderId# and tai.is_buy = 1 ) temp on temp.accessory_id = tt.accessory_id left join t_company_material_info tcmi on tcmi.material_id = tt.accessory_id where tt.is_buy = 1
